verses.text: Who hath \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* our \w report|strong="H8052"\w*? and to whom is the \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w*?\f + \fr 53.1 \ft report: or, doctrine?: Heb. hearing?\f*

For he shall grow \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him as a tender \w plant|strong="H3126"\w*, and as a \w root|strong="H8328"\w* out of a \w dry|strong="H6723"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: he hath no \w form|strong="H8389"\w* nor \w comeliness|strong="H1926"\w*; and when we shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* him, \add there is\add* no \w beauty|strong="H4758"\w* that we should \w desire|strong="H2530"\w* him.

He is \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* and \w rejected|strong="H2310"\w* of \w men|strong="H0376"\w*; a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w sorrows|strong="H4341"\w*, and \w acquainted|strong="H3045"\w* with \w grief|strong="H2483"\w*: and we hid as it \w were|strong="H4564"\w* \add our\add* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* from him; he was \w despised|strong="H0959"\w*, and we \w esteemed|strong="H2803"\w* him not.\f + \fr 53.3 \ft we hid…: or, he hid as it were his face from us: Heb. as an hiding of faces from him, or, from us\f*

¶ \w Surely|strong="H0403"\w* he hath \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* our \w griefs|strong="H2483"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H5445"\w* our \w sorrows|strong="H4341"\w*: yet we did \w esteem|strong="H2803"\w* him \w stricken|strong="H5060"\w*, \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w*.

But he \add was\add* \w wounded|strong="H2490"\w* for our \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*, \add he was\add* \w bruised|strong="H1792"\w* for our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*: the \w chastisement|strong="H4148"\w* of our \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add was\add* upon him; and with his \w stripes|strong="H2250"\w* we are \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.\f + \fr 53.5 \ft wounded: or, tormented\f*\f + \fr 53.5 \ft stripes: Heb. bruise\f*

All we like \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* have gone \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*; we have \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his own \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w laid|strong="H6293"\w* on him the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of us all.\f + \fr 53.6 \ft laid…: Heb. made the iniquity of us all to meet on him\f*

He was \w oppressed|strong="H5065"\w*, and he was \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w*, yet he \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* not his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: he is \w brought|strong="H2986"\w* as a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w* to the \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*, and as a \w sheep|strong="H7353"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* her \w shearers|strong="H1494"\w* is \w dumb|strong="H0481"\w*, so he \w openeth|strong="H6605"\w* not his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

He was \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* from \w prison|strong="H6115"\w* and from \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: and who shall \w declare|strong="H7878"\w* his \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*? for he was cut \w off|strong="H1504"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*: for the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* was he \w stricken|strong="H5061"\w*.\f + \fr 53.8 \ft from prison…: or, away by distress and judgment: but, etc\f*\f + \fr 53.8 \ft was he…: Heb. was the stroke upon him\f*

And he \w made|strong="H5414"\w* his \w grave|strong="H6913"\w* with the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, and with the \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* in his \w death|strong="H4194"\w*; because he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* no \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*, neither \add was any\add* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w* in his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.\f + \fr 53.9 \ft death: Heb. deaths\f*

¶ Yet it \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w bruise|strong="H1792"\w* him; he hath put \add him\add* to \w grief|strong="H2470"\w*: when thou shalt \w make|strong="H7760"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* an offering for \w sin|strong="H0817"\w*, he shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add his\add* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, he shall \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \add his\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and the \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.  +  r 53.10  t thou…: or, his soul shall make an offering *

He shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* of the \w travail|strong="H5999"\w* of his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \add and\add* shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*: by his \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* shall my \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w justify|strong="H6663"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*; for he shall \w bear|strong="H5445"\w* their \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.

Therefore will I \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* him \add a portion\add* with the \w great|strong="H7227"\w*, and he shall \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* with the \w strong|strong="H6099"\w*; because he hath poured \w out|strong="H6168"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* unto \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: and he was \w numbered|strong="H4487"\w* with the \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w*; and he \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, and made \w intercession|strong="H6293"\w* for the \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w*.
